com.assylias.jbloomberg

Interface RequestBuilder<T extends RequestResult>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HistoricalRequestBuilder, IntradayBarRequestBuilder, IntradayTickRequestBuilder, ReferenceRequestBuilder

    public interface RequestBuilder<T extends RequestResult>
    An interface used to create static or historical requests: users of this API should use existing implementations of this interface.

    This interface has been made public for convenience but users should not need to implement it.

        BloombergRequestType getRequestType()
        Returns:

      • buildRequest

        com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Request buildRequest(com.bloomberglp.blpapi.Session session)
        Parameters:
        session - the session to which the request will be sent
        Returns:
        a properly built request that can be submitted to the session

      • getResultParser

        ResultParser<T> getResultParser()
        Returns:
